name: Razer  Naga Hex Wraith Red Laser Gaming Mouse
categoryPath: Electronics/Computers/Computer Accessories/Keyboards, Mice & Joysticks/Mice & Mice Pads

reviews.name: Razer Naga Hex Mouse, Wraith Red Edition
reviews.reviewText:
The first Hex I owned had defective optics in it. It was jittery and would randomly shoot the cursor off the screen when picking up the mouse.
I used it for 3 weeks before I fully realized that it was defective, and that it wasn't just my mouse pad or the way I was using the mouse. What really gave it away was when the mouse intermittently, and alternately, would stop traveling along the X or Y axes and traveled in straight lines instead. Just like how mechanical mice behave when they need cleaning. I returned it that day.

This one has no problems like that.

The only thing I noticed wrong with this one is that the mouse wheel squeaks sometimes when turning it. A minor issue, but it is annoying.

I won't say anything else as my other comments are under "Imapwnu" since the web site made me pick a new name. Go figure.
reviews.title: 2nd try with this mouse, this one works well.

reviews.name: Razer Naga Hex Mouse, Wraith Red Edition
reviews.reviewText:
I bought two of these.
First one was jittery and only got worse as I used it and eventually stopped tracking on both the x and y axes, but not at the same time.
I returned it, and bought the second one.
That one worked well out of the box, although the scroll wheel would occasionally "squeak" when scrolling, which was annoying. Well, after 3 weeks it starting getting jittery, especially when lifting the mouse, and started to intermittently fail to track on the x axis.
The problems were very sporadic on the second one, but I returned it while I still could.
I gave up on Razer and ordered a Corsair M95.
reviews.title: I tried 2, both had to be returned.

reviews.name: Razer Naga Hex Mouse, Wraith Red Edition
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic mouse. Great tracking, Great custom settings, Great appearance, and worth every penny spent. Not having used a mouse with this many usable buttons, it took me a couple of days to get the feel for where to press a button without looking but works great now.
reviews.title: Great Simply Great

reviews.name: Razer Naga Hex Mouse, Wraith Red Edition
reviews.reviewText: Its a good mouse however it tends to lose connection to laptop once and a while causing it to screw up my games sometimes
reviews.title: good mouse but touchy sometimes

reviews.name: Razer Naga Hex Mouse, Wraith Red Edition
reviews.reviewText: I bought this Razer Naga Hex Mouse, Wraith Red Edition after my other Razer Naga Epic wore out. I love this hex mouse the best, makes playing World of Warcraft a better experience. Took a little time to get used to having the keypad in the a circle but it's an amazing mouse everyone will love.
reviews.title: A Must Have!
